reviews.text: Not even a star but I gave it because they don't have an option for 0 stars or even minus. Employees that do not help you out but tell you to call assistance cause they don't know anything. Trains always delayed on that station because there's every day either a tree falling or a fire just next to purley but at least please put some decent people to work on the platforms.
Average, also the trains on platform 3 arrive unannounced for some reason
The staff at purley are always so helpful especially a lovely lady called Estelle , she always helps you with any advice on best routes to take , best fares etc
Staff are nice and helpful especially given the shitstorm they have to deal with on a daily basis. If you enjoy train delays every single day and short notice cancellations this is where it's at.
